title: anjalenrE
sahitya:
anjalenrE ANDaruLvAi aDimalar thanjamaiyA aDimai ennai


anupallavi

  panca nadIshvarA parama dayAkara praNatArttiharA pArvati manOharA ennai


caraNam    aram vaLartta ambikai en annai amarum ardhanArIshvaranE maram vaLar
 mAya aimpulan vashamAi bhuviyil pirandu piranduzhalum pEdaiyai manamirangi
